description.p: Level 0 is a new option for characters that allows them to start at level 0, with no class features, 1d6 hit points, and +1 proficiency bonus. This option is intended for campaigns that want to focus on character development and growth from the very beginning.
When you create a level 0 character, you can choose between the following options:

ul.li: Choose a background and gain the associated proficiencies.
